<h1 align="center">
  My Portfolio Website
</h1>

I built my portfolio using React and Gatsby.

I use [Tachyons](http://tachyons.io) as CSS library

I use the [Nord Theme](https://www.nordtheme.com) as color theme

The website is deployed on Netlify
